item.title: Salvador Perez's Oustanding Year
item.description: Salvador Perez had the best season heâ€™s ever had in 2021. With an injury putting him out for the 2019 season and only playing 37 out of the 60 scheduled in 2020, Perez was as fresh as ever coming into the 2021 season and it showed. He was voted for his seventh all-star game and captured his fifth gold glove, along with these awards Perez broke the record for most home runs by a catcher in a single season with 48.
